title: Sam Bankman-Fried To Spend 40-50 Years in Prison, Prosecutors Argue
description:
In a recent development in the lawsuit involving Sam-Bankman Fried, the ill-famed founder of the defunct crypto exchange FTX, the federal prosecutors claimed that the defendant deserves 40-50 years of prison sentence.
